title: Stood up to continue my prayer after imam said the first salam, is my prayer valid? Assim al hakeem
transcript: um he said that when the imam made the first salaam to the right i stood up and you said that my prayer is invalid i did not say that your prayer is invalid you did something wrong so those who stand up before the imam offers the second to sleep on the left to the left they have done something wrong their prayer is still valid insha allah
